metadata.title: Diaspora & Azadî - Migration Support Platform
metadata.description: Information platform for refugees living in the Netherlands. IND, COA, DigiD, BSN, health insurance and more.

about.title: About Us
about.description: An initiative founded by a group of Kurdish refugee activists to inform, advise and support each other for a good start in the Netherlands.
about.foundation: It is a liberating, solidarity-based and grassroots organization mainly consisting of people from Turkey and Kurdistan.
about.purpose: Our initiative aims to help newcomers and asylum seekers adapt to daily life in the Netherlands and to bring their knowledge and skills as a gain to society.
about.mission: Diaspora & Azadî evaluates the wishes, goals, obstacles and opportunities of refugees and migrants and organizes activities in cooperation with various civil society organizations.
offers: Up-to-date information on asylum and official procedures
Collaboration and activities with civil society organizations

emergency.title: Emergency
emergency.subtitle: Important emergency numbers and support lines in the Netherlands
emergency.emergencyDescription: Police, Ambulance, Fire Department - Call in life-threatening situations
emergency.listeningLineDesc: If you need someone to talk to
emergency.fierDesc: Victims of human trafficking and violence
emergency.importantNoteDesc: In life-threatening situations, always call 112. The numbers on this page are valid throughout the Netherlands. Some lines also offer support in languages other than Dutch.
